adjectives.description: eco (comparative more eco, superlative most eco)

entries.meaning: Clipping of ecological. Environmentally friendly or sensitive.
examples: Check the eco credentials of your paint â€“ not all are what they say on the tin.

entries.meaning: Clipping of economy. Affording economical use, e.g. of an appliance.
examples: This vacuum cleaner has an eco setting which preserves battery life.

description: From ECOWAS, the Economic Community of West African States, who propose to use the currency.

entries.meaning: A proposed name for the common currency that the West African Monetary Zone plans to introduce in the framework of the Economic Community of West African States.
